name: ROBO.Inc (LifeOfTheCookie)
description:
Development builds and (soon) a final version of my student project.

Feel free to let me know about any issue you may encounter, as this is work-in-progress.

Disclaimer: This game still undergoing development, and I can thus not guarantee full expected functionality. Any harm caused to a personal computer or any devices connected to it can not be blamed on the developers. No content of this build knowingly contains any malicious software.
